text: Kendriya Vidyalaya Mankhurd is a co-educational school run by KV Sangathan in Mankhurd, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. It is a CBSE affiliated school. == See also == * List of Kendriya Vidyalayas == External links == * Category:Kendriya Vidyalayas Category:Schools in Mumbai Category:Educational institutions established in 1987 Category:1987 establishments in India
title: Kendriya Vidyalaya Mankhurd
